tag: {id:"minecraft:firework_star",CustomModelData:2,check:1,display:{Lore:['{"text":"多くの国家・種族間で広く流通している統一通貨","color":"gray","italic":false,"underlined":true}','[{"text":"かつての","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false},{"text":"聖騎士【パラディン】","color":"yellow","bold":false,"italic":false},{"text":"が","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false},{"text":"強欲の魔王【マモン】","color":"dark_blue","bold":false,"italic":false},{"text":"を","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false}]','{"text":"封印した黄金十字架を加工して作られた硬貨。","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"text":"コインとして数多に分割され弱体化しているが","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"text":"列記とした上位悪魔の依代である。","color":"blue","bold":false,"italic":false}','[{"text":"「契約」","color":"red","bold":false,"italic":false},{"text":"に厳格で窃盗や詐欺があると","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false}]','{"text":"硬貨に宿る魔力が不履行者を呪い殺す。","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"text":"また一箇所に貯蓄しすぎるとマモンが顕現してしまうため、","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"text":"この富は独占されることなく健全に天下を回る貨幣として","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"text":"この上ない価値をもつ通貨である。","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"text":"まさに悪魔が保証した世界一安全な通貨。","color":"gray","bold":true,"italic":false}','{"text":"「神は死後の復活を保証したが、魔王は現世の金貨を保証した。」","color":"black","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"dark_purple","extra":[{"italic":false,"color":"#FFE33B","extra":[{"color":"#FFCC38","extra":[{"color":"#FFAC34","extra":[{"color":"#FF8330","extra":[{"color":"#FF602C","text":"✯"}],"text":"✯"}],"text":"✯"}],"text":"✯"}],"text":"✯"}],"text":"Super:"}'],Name:'{"text":"大統一金貨【マモン】","color":"dark_purple","bold":true,"italic":false,"underlined":true}'},rare:5}
